text:
August 3# 1943
Mr* M. S. NoviK,
0|rector WNYC
Municipal Building
New York* New York
□ear Movik:
Thanks for seeding me the note on The Billboard
CITATION* I HAD SEEN IT IN YOUR REGULAR $NYC RELEASE*
Guess you are busy nowadays with the Harlem disorder
SO WON1T TAKE MORE OF YOUR TIME NOW*
Regards*
Frank £• Schooley
